video_prompt: Pink and white flower petals flutter down, landing on an open book nestled amongst blooming flowers. A faint rainbow arc subtly shifts across the sky and ocean.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Tranquil fantasy art: Open book on a sandy, flower-strewn ground (pink, white, blue daisies/chrysanthemums) with petals nestled in pages. Above, a calm blue ocean meets a pale, sunny sky with a faint rainbow. Pink and white flower petals gracefully fall through the air. Emphasize nature and literature intertwining.
refined_video_prompt: Pink and white flower petals flutter down and gently settle. Simultaneously, a faint rainbow arc subtly shifts and undulates across the sky and ocean.
